sections.name: Integrated Reasoning (IR)
sections.description: Multi-source reasoning, graphics interpretation, two-part analysis, table analysis

sections.name: Quantitative Reasoning
sections.description: Problem Solving and Data Sufficiency questions

sections.name: Verbal Reasoning
sections.description: Reading Comprehension, Critical Reasoning, and Sentence Correction

scoring.scoreCancellation: Option to cancel scores immediately after the test

testWindows.rescheduling: Allowed with fee, up to 24 hours before appointment

fees.rescheduleFee: $60 (if done more than 7 days before test date)
fees.cancellationFee: $100 refund if cancelled more than 7 days before test date

registration.deadlines: Up to 24 hours before test time (subject to availability)

testDayRequirements: Valid, original ID (must match registration exactly)
Optional: Comfortable clothing, water, snacks for breaks
testCenterRules: No personal items allowed in testing room
No access to phones/electronics during breaks

scoreReporting.immediateUnofficialScores: Verbal, Quantitative, and Total scores available immediately after test
scoreReporting.scoreSending: Up to 5 programs included in test fee, additional reports available for a fee

accommodations.available: Yes, for test-takers with disabilities or health-related needs
accommodations.requestProcess: Submit request with documentation to GMAC

testFormat.questionNavigation: Cannot skip or return to questions
testFormat.onScreenCalculator: Available for Integrated Reasoning section only
